unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Bumrah? Heard he twisted his ankle pretty bad during the last Ranji Trophy match in Bangalore. Wishing him a speedy recovery! Hope he's back in time for the Asia Cup. Remember what happened in Lagaan, can't afford key players injured. AIIMS doctors are top-notch, hope they're looking after him well. Get well soon, champ! He's crucial for us.
